Package curam.util.dataaccess

Provides the API for accessing and processing data in a data source

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataAccess
    DataAccess is the interface implemented by Curam data access objects.
    TransactionCallback
    TransactionCallback interface defines a callback class which is accessed at the end of each Transaction but just before the transaction is committed.
    TransactionTimesRegister
    Registers transaction times for the purpose of keeping GSS Lucene indexes in sync.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuditMappingsHelper
    Helper class for audit mappings.
    CuramValueList<E>
    CuramValueList is an ArrayList used to hold results from read multi queries by the Dynamic Data Access API.
    DatabaseMetaData
    DatabaseMetaData is used to construct and transfer the Database related meta-data configuration.
    DefaultTransactionCallback
    Default implementation of TransactionCallback interface.
    DynamicDataAccess
    DynamicDataAccess is an API which can be used to execute a SQL statement which has been created in application code.
    KeyRepository
    This class provides support for application tests.
    KeyRepository.EntityKeyInfo
    Class containing key information from the most recently insert instance of an application entity.
    ReadmultiOperation<T>
    A Curam "readmulti" operation is one which retrieves multiple rows from the application database.
    StandardReadmultiOperation<T>
    StandardReadmultiOperation is the ReadmultiOperation subclass used by the Curam infrastructure to assemble database result sets into arrays for returning from entity readmulti operations.

Package curam.util.dataaccess Description

Provides the API for accessing and processing data in a data source.
Since:
Curam SDEJ3.0.0
